sentences: Erik Friedlander is an American cellist and composer based in New York City.
A veteran of New York City's experimental downtown scene, Friedlander has worked in many contexts, but is perhaps best known for his frequent collaborations with saxophonist John Zorn.
He graduated from Columbia University in 1982.
Friedlander started playing guitar at age six and added cello two years later.
